revision.text:
El '''clima''' es una mecánica del juego que refleja las condiciones atmosféricas afectando al ataque de ciertos tipos. Cambia cada cuatro horas y algunas condiciones solo pueden ocurrir en [[Regions|regiones]] concretas. El tiempo también condiciona la evolución y la disponibilidad de algunos Pokémon. =Detalles= La siguiente tabla es correcta para la versión 0.8.15.
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Weather !! Description !! Type modifier(s) !! RNG weight !! Region |- | [[File:Clear.png|30px]] Clear || The weather is clear and pleasant. || None || 30 || rowspan = 5 | All |- | [[File:Overcast.png|30px]] Overcast || Clouds fill the skies. || Normal x1.1 || 15 |- | [[File:Rain.png|30px]] Rain || It's rainy and humid. || Water x1.1 Bug x1.05 || 10 |- | [[File:Thunderstorm.png|30px]] Thunderstorm || It's currently raining heavily with thunder. || Water x1.1, Electric x1.1 Fire x0.9 || 5 |- | [[File:Sunny.png|30px]] Sunny || The sunlight is strong. || Fire x1.2, Grass x1.1, Water x0.9 || 10 |- | [[File:Snow.png|30px]] Snow || It's cold and snowing. || Ice x1.05 || 5 || rowspan = 3 | Johto onwards |- | [[File:Hail.png|30px]] Hail || It's cold and hailing. || Ice x1.1 || 3 |- | [[File:Blizzard.png|30px]] Blizzard || A howling blizzard blows. || Ice x1.2, Fire x0.9, Grass x0.9 || 2 |- | [[File:Sandstorm.png|30px]] Sandstorm || A sandstorm is raging. || Rock x1.1, Ground x1.1, Steel x1.1 || 10 || Hoenn onwards |- | [[File:Fog.png|30px]] Fog || The fog is deep... || Ghost x1.2 Dark x1.1 Electric x0.9 || 10 || Sinnoh onwards |- | [[File:Windy.png|30px]] Windy || Mysterious strong winds blow. || Flying x1.2, Dragon x1.1 || 1 || Unova onwards |}
=Pokémon afectados por el clima=
{| class="wikitable" |+ Weather-dependent evolutions ! Pokémon !! Evolution !! Required weather |- | [[File:Cherrim_(overcast).png|30px]]Cherrim (overcast) || [[File:Cherrim_(sunshine).png|30px]]Cherrim (sunshine) || Sunny |- | [[File:Sliggoo.png|30px]]Sliggoo || [[File:Goodra.png|30px]]Goodra || Rain or Fog |}
{| class="wikitable" |+ Weather-dependent route encounters ! Pokémon !! Required weather !! Route |- | [[File:Castform_(sunny).png|30px]]Castform (sunny) || Sunny || rowspan = 3| Hoenn 119 |- | [[File:Castform_(rainy).png|30px]]Castform (rainy) || Rain or Thunderstorm |- | [[File:Castform_(snowy).png|30px]]Castform (snowy) || Snow, Blizzard, Hail, or Fog |}
revision.comment: Created page with "La siguiente tabla es correcta para la versión 0.8.15."

revision.text:
'''Weather''' is a game mechanic reflecting atmospheric conditions that affects Pokémon attack values of certain types. It changes every four hours and certain weather conditions can only occur in specific [[Regions]]. Weather also restricts the evolution and in-route availability of certain Pokémon.
=Detalles=
The table below is accurate as of version 0.8.15.
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Weather !! Description !! Type modifier(s) !! RNG weight !! Region |- | [[File:Clear.png|30px]] Clear || The weather is clear and pleasant. || None || 30 || rowspan = 5 | All |- | [[File:Overcast.png|30px]] Overcast || Clouds fill the skies. || Normal x1.1 || 15 |- | [[File:Rain.png|30px]] Rain || It's rainy and humid. || Water x1.1 Bug x1.05 || 10 |- | [[File:Thunderstorm.png|30px]] Thunderstorm || It's currently raining heavily with thunder. || Water x1.1, Electric x1.1 Fire x0.9 || 5 |- | [[File:Sunny.png|30px]] Sunny || The sunlight is strong. || Fire x1.2, Grass x1.1, Water x0.9 || 10 |- | [[File:Snow.png|30px]] Snow || It's cold and snowing. || Ice x1.05 || 5 || rowspan = 3 | Johto onwards |- | [[File:Hail.png|30px]] Hail || It's cold and hailing. || Ice x1.1 || 3 |- | [[File:Blizzard.png|30px]] Blizzard || A howling blizzard blows. || Ice x1.2, Fire x0.9, Grass x0.9 || 2 |- | [[File:Sandstorm.png|30px]] Sandstorm || A sandstorm is raging. || Rock x1.1, Ground x1.1, Steel x1.1 || 10 || Hoenn onwards |- | [[File:Fog.png|30px]] Fog || The fog is deep... || Ghost x1.2 Dark x1.1 Electric x0.9 || 10 || Sinnoh onwards |- | [[File:Windy.png|30px]] Windy || Mysterious strong winds blow. || Flying x1.2, Dragon x1.1 || 1 || Unova onwards |}
=Pokémon afectados por el clima=
{| class="wikitable" |+ Weather-dependent evolutions ! Pokémon !! Evolution !! Required weather |- | [[File:Cherrim_(overcast).png|30px]]Cherrim (overcast) || [[File:Cherrim_(sunshine).png|30px]]Cherrim (sunshine) || Sunny |- | [[File:Sliggoo.png|30px]]Sliggoo || [[File:Goodra.png|30px]]Goodra || Rain or Fog |}
{| class="wikitable" |+ Weather-dependent route encounters ! Pokémon !! Required weather !! Route |- | [[File:Castform_(sunny).png|30px]]Castform (sunny) || Sunny || rowspan = 3| Hoenn 119 |- | [[File:Castform_(rainy).png|30px]]Castform (rainy) || Rain or Thunderstorm |- | [[File:Castform_(snowy).png|30px]]Castform (snowy) || Snow, Blizzard, Hail, or Fog |}

'''Weather''' is a game mechanic reflecting atmospheric conditions that affects Pokémon attack values of certain types. It changes every four hours and certain weather conditions can only occur in specific [[Regions]]. Weather also restricts the evolution and in-route availability of certain Pokémon.
=Details=
The table below is accurate as of version 0.8.15.
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Weather !! Description !! Type modifier(s) !! RNG weight !! Region |- | [[File:Clear.png|30px]] Clear || The weather is clear and pleasant. || None || 30 || rowspan = 5 | All |- | [[File:Overcast.png|30px]] Overcast || Clouds fill the skies. || Normal x1.1 || 15 |- | [[File:Rain.png|30px]] Rain || It's rainy and humid. || Water x1.1 Bug x1.05 || 10 |- | [[File:Thunderstorm.png|30px]] Thunderstorm || It's currently raining heavily with thunder. || Water x1.1, Electric x1.1 Fire x0.9 || 5 |- | [[File:Sunny.png|30px]] Sunny || The sunlight is strong. || Fire x1.2, Grass x1.1, Water x0.9 || 10 |- | [[File:Snow.png|30px]] Snow || It's cold and snowing. || Ice x1.05 || 5 || rowspan = 3 | Johto onwards |- | [[File:Hail.png|30px]] Hail || It's cold and hailing. || Ice x1.1 || 3 |- | [[File:Blizzard.png|30px]] Blizzard || A howling blizzard blows. || Ice x1.2, Fire x0.9, Grass x0.9 || 2 |- | [[File:Sandstorm.png|30px]] Sandstorm || A sandstorm is raging. || Rock x1.1, Ground x1.1, Steel x1.1 || 10 || Hoenn onwards |- | [[File:Fog.png|30px]] Fog || The fog is deep... || Ghost x1.2 Dark x1.1 Electric x0.9 || 10 || Sinnoh onwards |- | [[File:Windy.png|30px]] Windy || Mysterious strong winds blow. || Flying x1.2, Dragon x1.1 || 1 || Unova onwards |}
=Pokémon afectados por el clima=
{| class="wikitable" |+ Weather-dependent evolutions ! Pokémon !! Evolution !! Required weather |- | [[File:Cherrim_(overcast).png|30px]]Cherrim (overcast) || [[File:Cherrim_(sunshine).png|30px]]Cherrim (sunshine) || Sunny |- | [[File:Sliggoo.png|30px]]Sliggoo || [[File:Goodra.png|30px]]Goodra || Rain or Fog |}
